channel.title: How to let ppl in server
channel.description: plz i need help can some1 help me i used ham made a new network but i dont kno wat to do next :confused: plz help me :( if i only need ham can some1 check mine ham network: Pkerspkspot pass:123 plz if u need ham only to let ppl in serv then plz check mine if not plz help me....(sorry that might have sounded noobish but im new to making servs so id be glad if some1 would help :s)[br][size=1]Posted on: May 01, 2007, 08:00:54 PM[/size][hr]ok... i got a no-ip pkers.no-ip.biz but do i still need to forward my port??? i tried changing my client's port to 5555 and couldnt login then 43594 then logged in does this mean i dont need to forward my port??

item.title: How to let ppl in server
item.dc:creator: @pker_franc0 pker franc0
item.description:
@pker_franc0 wrote:

hey thx for the help, i managed to get boh hamachi and no-ip and got 100 char files in a day

Read full topic

item.title: How to let ppl in server
item.dc:creator: @egor42 egor42
item.description:
@egor42 wrote:

just use hamachi for begginging leting people in. then when you know that works try moving on to no-ip because lots more people will come on and if you host it and nobody can get in cuz u did something wrong you might get flamed
I agree with you *barrows ftw* ..but when i first foudn about this moparscape.. i created a server after 1 month on no-ip :)

Read full topic
item.source: How to let ppl in server
